coded_answer.p: I have just read your letter and it would be grateful if you could give me more information about the two weeks at camp California in the USA.

I am a nineteen year oldnineteen-year-old gildgirl who is still attending classes at Saint John's School. For the past four years I have been playing tennis and I have also done some courses aboutin painting.

I would appreciate it if I could travel onin July because my school gives me two wintersummer holiday'sholiday weekweeksweeks'weeks' summer holiday. As far as accommodation is concernconcerned, I prefer staying in a longlog cabin. I believe it is better than a tent because this one would notthat would not provide shelter enoughenough shelter. As I said before, I have been playing tennis for four years. I consider myself to be good at this sport. As regardingregards painting, I know a lot about it since my grandmother taughtaught me when I was five years old.
It would be very kind of you to let me know about the clothes you think it wouldwill be necessary for me to take and how much money I will need.
I look forward to hearing from you.
I'm sorry I haven't written to you before but I have been very busy helping at Mano''sMano's concert.

Do you remember when I told you that my dream was helpingto help Mano''sMano's group? Well, my dream comecame true. AllIt all started when I was inat Drama Club and my singing teacher told me that Mano''sMano's group were going to have a concert here, in Argentina. She also told me that she havehas some conectionsconnections with the people in charge of the lights ofat the concert. You know that last year I organiseorganised the lights inat our performance. So, there I was, controlingcontrolling the illumination inof Mano's concert!!!!

I will never forget that wonderful experience. ThisIt really helphas really helped me for our next performance inat the Drama Club. It was so exciting to see the Mano'Mano's group singer that I felt as if I were in heaven!!
Please write to me as soon as you can.
